title: What’s Coming to Disney+ in December 2024
description: As the holiday season kicks into gear, new show premieres on Disney+ like “Star Wars: Skeleton Crew” and the new season of Marvel’s “What If…?” are some of the most anticipated. It’s also a big month to check out documentaries from National Geographic including “Sugarcane” and “Blink” alongside thrillers like “Cuckoo” starring Hunter Schafer and […]
author: Andrés Buenahora
excerpt: Disney+ show "Star Wars: Skeleton Crew" will premiere Dec. 3 with the first two episodes.
text: As the holiday season kicks into gear, new show premieres on Disney+ like “Star Wars: Skeleton Crew” and the new season of Marvel’s “What If…?” are some of the most anticipated. It’s also a big month to check out documentaries from National Geographic including “Sugarcane” and “Blink” alongside thrillers like “Cuckoo” starring Hunter Schafer and “Alice, Darling” starring Anna Kendrick. Take a look at Disney+’s full December slate below, and sign up for a Disney+ account here. Dec. 2 Popular on Variety “Mickey and the Very Many Christmases” Dec. 3 “Jung Kook: I Am Still – The Original” (Season 1, 3 episodes)“Star Wars: Skeleton Crew” (Season 1, 2 episodes) Dec. 4 “CMA Country Christmas” (premiere)“Light Shop” (four episode premiere)“Marvel’s Spidey and his Amazing Friends” (Season 3, 5 episodes) Dec. 5 “Wild Crime” (Season 4) Dec. 6 “Buddy’s Holiday Recipe Rumble” (Season 1)“Critical Incident” (Season 1)“Paris Has Fallen” (Season 1) Dec. 7 “Destruction Decoded” (Season 2, 9 episodes)“Inside the Enchanted Forests” (Season 1, 6 episodes) Dec. 9 “Blue Minisodes”“The Simpsons Funday Football” (Live 5 p.m. PT) Dec. 10 “Coup!”“The Real Full Monty”“Sugarcane” Dec. 11 “Big City Greens” (Season 4, 1 episode)“Dream Productions” (all episodes)“Mickey Mouse Funhouse” (Season 3, 4 episodes)“Star Wars: Skeleton Crew” (Season 1, episode 3) Dec. 13 “The Bravest Knight: Season 2A”“Elton John: Never Too Late”“Invisible” (all episodes) Dec. 16 “Law & Order” (Seasons 1-20)“Morphie and the Magic Pets” (Season 1, 6 episodes) Dec. 17 “Blink”“Cuckoo”“The Simpsons: O C’mon All Ye Faithful” Dec. 18 “SuperKitties” (Season 2, 5 episodes)”ZOMBIES: The Re-Animated Series” (Season 1, 4 episodes)“Star Wars: Skeleton Crew” (Season 1, episode 4) Dec. 20 “Ilana Glazer: Human Magic” (premiere)“Lost Treasures of the Bible” (Season 1, 6 episodes) Dec. 22 “What If…?” (Season 3, episode 1) Dec. 23 “What If…?” (Season 3, episode 2)“Me & Winnie the Pooh” (Season 2, 5 episodes)”Playdate with Winnie the Pooh: Shorts” (Season 2, 3 episodes) Dec. 24 “What If…?” (Season 3, episode 3) Dec. 25 “Doctor Who: Joy to the World”“What If…?” (Season 3, episode 4)“Star Wars: Skeleton Crew” (Season 1, episode 5) Dec. 26 “What If…?” (Season 3, episode 5) Dec. 27 “Breaking”“John Williams in Tokyo”“What If…?” (Season 3, episode 6) Dec. 28 “Alice, Darling”“What If…?” (Season 3, episode 7) Dec. 29 “What If…?” (Season 3, episode 8)
html:
As the holiday season kicks into gear, new show premieres on Disney+ like “Star Wars: Skeleton Crew” and the new season of Marvel’s “What If…?” are some of the most anticipated. It’s also a big month to check out documentaries from National Geographic including “Sugarcane” and “Blink” alongside thrillers like “Cuckoo” starring Hunter Schafer and “Alice, Darling” starring Anna Kendrick.

Take a look at Disney+’s full December slate below, and sign up for a Disney+ account here.

Dec. 2

“Mickey and the Very Many Christmases”
